output.sentences: Betsy's surprise baby shower was a lot of fun.
Guests enjoyed her reaction when the secret was revealed.
Betsy enjoyed the lemon cake, which was her favorite kind.
Everyone watched as Betsy opened gifts.
She was soon overloaded with tons of lovely presents from her well-meaning friends.
